post.body: was he sober?
happy birthday!!
nice! Good job misty!
some of those were pretty rough, but not as bad as the guy singing "o holy night".
you can ask them to remake it if you are not happy with it.
until what?
press the home button and the on off button at the same time. Keep them pressed until you gear a click.
my friend said they were like crack in a crunchy shell.
so far I'm liking it better than twitteriffic. Seems much more stable and I like the local twitters!
worst feeling ever!
did you ever find out what MHP stood for?
apparently, the heat causes it, and is supposed to keep it from exploding.
yay! Were there fireworks and mixed drinks?
Waiting in line to vote. Again.
Ludacris and Young Jeezy have reminded me of the importance of voting.
Car vs. Deer on sb 400 before 13. The deer lost but his lawyers are contesting the ruling.
It's dark, gray and cold out. Heading home.
